pages.text: Now that I know of souls, I wonder if I know of gods... what differs the soul of a god from the soul of a mortal? Do they even have one? $(o)Could I become one?$()
I only know things so far: a god must be believed in. And maybe, just maybe, a god does not have $(o)one$() Soul. After all, doesn't a god controll all primal aspects of reality?
